jd: From: Uttkarsh Rai, Vyze Inc uttkarsh@vyzeinc.com Reply to: uttkarsh@vyzeinc.com Job Description -JOB TITLE : Sr. Design Program Manager Bellevue, WA Please try to submit local candidates! Qualifications Bachelor s degree 7-10+ years of experience design project or program management experience across digital ecosystems, including but not limited to eComm, Apps, Web and Design language systems. A proven track record of partnering across a wide array of internal business groups, external marketing agencies, executive stakeholders and execution partners. Ability to delegate tasks across multiple projects and workstreams (resource management, capacity tracking, resource planning, etc.) Experience with communication, workflow and creative asset management systems such as Asana, Workfront, Jira, Sketch, Figma, Slack and similar tools. Strong written and oral communication skills. Confidence developing and presenting materials to stakeholders - including Director and VP-level senior leadership. Experience managing project and scrum teams in Agile environments. - Will Support Frontline tools Technology Requirements (I.E Programs, systems, etc) What does a typical day look like? (daily tasks) Support UX design team with agile delivery
